scatterbytes.errors

Contents

Source code for scatterbytes.errors

"""error classes used by this package.

"""


[docs]def format_exc(e):
    if isinstance(e, Exception):
        name = e.__class__.__name__
        msg = '%s: %s' % (name, str(e))
    else:
        msg = str(e)
    return msg



[docs]class SBError(Exception): pass



[docs]class SBValueError(ValueError, SBError): pass



[docs]class RequestExpiredError(SBError): pass



[docs]class StaleCommandRelayError(SBError): pass



[docs]class ConfigError(SBError): pass



[docs]class ClientNotFoundError(SBError): pass



[docs]class ChecksumError(SBError):
    """error checksumming file

    used for disk and transmission related errors

    """
    pass



[docs]class SecureHashError(SBError):
    """secure hash check failed

    used when comparison against secure hash (SHA-2) fails

    """
    pass



[docs]class DuplicateFilenameError(SBError): pass



[docs]class FileNotFoundError(SBError): pass



[docs]class FileExistsError(SBError): pass



[docs]class VolumeNotFoundError(SBError): pass



[docs]class OutOfStorageError(SBError): pass



[docs]class InsufficientStorageError(SBError): pass



[docs]class ChunkError(SBError):
    """related to file chunks"""
    pass



[docs]class ChunkNotFoundError(ChunkError): pass



[docs]class ChunkChecksumError(ChunkError, ChecksumError):
    """checksuming chunk failed"""
    pass



[docs]class DownloadError(SBError): pass



[docs]class UpdateError(SBError): pass



[docs]class EncryptionError(SBError): pass



[docs]class TransferLogError(SBError):
    """error related to download or upload log"""
    pass



[docs]class AuthenticationError(SBError): pass



[docs]class HTTPError(SBError): pass
